name: Create Docupilot invoices automatically from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create an invoice from a Docupilot template. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_9c7rHfebaiBR5llkuOcGxK0WgY7z6j9H6M9I3dujAE/edit?usp=sharing).
